snippet: Andy Murray has been voted BBC Sports Personality of the Year for a record third time after winning the Wimbledon and Olympic singles titles in 2016 and also finishing the season as the world's top-ranked player....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray has been voted BBC Sports Personality of the Year for a record third time after winning the Wimbledon and Olympic singles titles in 2016 and also finishing the season as the world's top-ranked player.

headline.print_headline: Murray Caps Best Year of Career With Record 3rd BBC Award
headline.main: Murray Caps Best Year of Career With Record 3rd BBC Award
